titles.title: Providing for consideration of (H.J. Res. 27) withdrawing the approval of the United States from the Agreement establishing the World Trade Organization.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-106, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 27 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 47.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 304.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/8/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J. Res. 27 (withdrawing the approval of the United States from the Agreement establishing the World Trade Organization).
